name: sqreen

scripts.test-cov: lab -cLv -a code -r console -o stdout -r html -o coverage.html -I SharedArrayBuffer,Atomics,URLSearchParams,URL,BigUint64Array,BigInt64Array,BigInt,TextEncoder,TextDecoder,queueMicrotask,EventTarget,Event,MessageChannel,MessagePort,MessageEvent,AggregateError,atob,btoa,performance
scripts.pretest-ci: mkdir -p coverage && npm i --no-save sq-native && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm run install-tests
scripts.test-ci-e2e: npm run pretest-ci && NOCOV=1 lab e2e -I SharedArrayBuffer,Atomics,URLSearchParams,URL,BigUint64Array,BigInt64Array,BigInt,TextEncoder,TextDecoder,queueMicrotask,AbortController,AbortSignal,FinalizationRegistry,WeakRef,EventTarget,Event,MessageChannel,MessagePort,MessageEvent,AggregateError,atob,btoa,performance
scripts.test-ci-win: npm i --no-save hapi@16.6 express@4 supertest@3.3 passport-local @hapi/hoek lab@14.3.1 && lab -I SharedArrayBuffer,Atomics,URLSearchParams,URL,BigUint64Array,BigInt64Array,BigInt,TextEncoder,TextDecoder,queueMicrotask,AbortController,AbortSignal,FinalizationRegistry,WeakRef,EventTarget,Event,MessageChannel,MessagePort,MessageEvent,AggregateError,atob,btoa,performance
scripts.install-tests: npm i --no-save hapi@16.6 express@4 supertest@3.3 passport-local @hapi/hoek lab@14.3.1 body-parser cookie-parser
scripts.install-waf: npm explore sq-native -- npm run install

author: sqreen
description: Node.js agent for Sqreen, please see https://www.sqreen.io/

devDependencies_details.bluebird: promise library, to test specific hooks
devDependencies_details.decache: tool to decache already required modules
devDependencies_details.nsp: lookup for know security issues in the dependencies descibed in the current file
devDependencies_details.tapable: Just a little module for plugins (used for test module load)
devDependencies_details.hapi: only for ci and dev, we don't want it to go in people's app
devDependencies_details.express: only for ci and dev, we don't want it to go in people's app
devDependencies_details.supertest: only for ci and dev, we don't want it to go in people's app

dependencies_details.ip-range-check: check if an ip address is in a range (used for black/white list
dependencies_details.ip-router: radix tree for ip related sec automation
dependencies_details.on-finished: emit when an HTTP request finishes
dependencies_details.shimmer: shimming lib used to override native functions
dependencies_details.winston: a multi-transport async logging library for node.js
dependencies_details.async-listener: instrumentation of async operations in node core
